41.eng-name: The Book of al-Fara' and al-'Atirah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Sawdah, the wife of the Prophet, said:"A sheep of ours died, and we tanned its skin, and continued to make Nabidh in it until it wore out

chapter.eng-name: The Skin Of Dead Animals (Those Not Slaughtered Or Killed Properly)
